attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A Prime Decision Minister and Prime Communications Minister might not be excluded from the informal constitution of the UK.
If thinkers fail on the airhead count of image, seemingly needed - so separate them.
First Lord of the Treasury might not need to turn up for PMQs

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
